title: Handle Guest Complaint About Obstructed View
description: A guest complains that their view of the stage is partially obstructed by a large speaker, which was not disclosed when they bought the ticket.

tasks.description: Apologize for the issue and look up the guest's seat location in the ticketing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the guest's seat and checks its status.

tasks.description: Verify if the seat is officially marked as 'obstructed view' in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the seat is not marked as obstructed view, validating the guest's complaint.

tasks.description: Find comparable or better seats in an unobstructed section that are available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds two available seats in a nearby section with a clear view.

tasks.description: Re-seat the guest to the new location at no charge and issue new tickets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully moves the guest to the new seats and provides them with new tickets.
